Q: HOW TO CHANGE LANGUAGE IN GAME?

A: Run "regedit", go to HEY_CURRENT_USER -> Software -> Valve -> Steam (click on it) and there change Language "russian" to "english".

When I ran regedit first time, I was at this location.

Nevermind, got it.

Just install VMWare, open VMWare and enter one of the serials.
Go to 'file' > 'open', go to the folder where CSGOBeta is, and double click that.
Then follow Rhythmus' instructions to change the language.
